xinstall.name: Show image
xinstall.description: Shows a static, dynamic or slideshow image.

param.name: css_name
param.label: CSS postfix
param.description: A value that will be added to all default class / id values for module identification.

param.name: show_type
param.label: Display type
param.description: Defines the way the imager should be displayed.

param.name: show_link
param.label: Link image
param.description: Defines whether the image should be linked to the defined URL.

param.name: link
param.label: Link
param.description: The URL the image should link to.

param.name: folder
param.label: Image folder
param.description: The folder in which the images are located.

param.name: prefix
param.label: Image prefix
param.description: A value that images that should be displayed start with.

param.name: ext
param.label: Image extension
param.description: The extension(s) of the images. Seperated by pipes (e.g. jpg|png|gif).

param.name: default
param.label: Default image
param.description: The image that should be displayed by default.

param.name: alt
param.label: Alt-value
param.description: The alt-attribute value of the displayed image.
